mapper.select: SELECT SP_ID,SP_NAME,SP_PARENT_ID,SP_DESC,HREF,TARGET,ICON,SP_VISIBLE,SP_TYPE,PERMISSION,VERSION,SYS_ID FROM SECURITY_PERMISSION where SP_ID= #{spId} AND SP_VISIBLE='Y'

SELECT SP_ID,SP_NAME,SP_PARENT_ID,SP_DESC,HREF,TARGET,ICON,SP_VISIBLE,SP_TYPE,PERMISSION,VERSION,SYS_ID FROM SECURITY_PERMISSION WHERE SP_PARENT_ID=#{parentId} AND SYS_ID=#{sysId} AND SP_TYPE='button' AND SP_VISIBLE='Y'

SELECT SP.SP_ID,SP.SP_NAME,SP.SP_PARENT_ID,SP.SP_DESC,SP.HREF,SP.TARGET,SP.ICON,SP.SP_VISIBLE,SP.SP_TYPE,SP.PERMISSION,SP.VERSION,SP.SYS_ID FROM SECURITY_ROLE_PERMISSION RP ,SECURITY_PERMISSION SP WHERE SP.SP_ID=RP.SP_ID AND RP.SR_ID IN(SELECT SR_ID FROM SECURITY_USER_ROLE WHERE SU_ID = (SELECT SU_ID FROM SECURITY_USER WHERE SU_ACCOUNT=#{account})) AND SP.SYS_ID=#{sysId} AND SP.SP_VISIBLE='Y'

SELECT SP.SP_ID,SP.SP_NAME,SP.SP_PARENT_ID,SP.SP_DESC,SP.HREF,SP.TARGET,SP.ICON,SP.SP_VISIBLE,SP.SP_TYPE,SP.PERMISSION,SP.VERSION,SP.SYS_ID FROM SECURITY_ROLE_PERMISSION RP ,SECURITY_PERMISSION SP WHERE SP.SP_ID=RP.SP_ID AND RP.SR_ID=#{srId} AND SP.SYS_ID=#{sysId} AND SP.SP_VISIBLE='Y'
